smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carb intake to 45% of total caloric intake by increasing awareness of portion sizes and label reading during meals, starting from next Monday and aiming for a 10% reduction each week.
Increase physical activity to 150 minutes per week through activities like brisk walking or cycling, starting this coming Tuesday, aiming for 30 minutes per day, 5 days a week.
Monitor and log blood glucose levels twice daily, starting tomorrow, aiming for an average of 150 mg/dL before meals and under 180 mg/dL two hours after meals.
Improve medication adherence by setting reminders and placing pills near the coffee maker, starting from Wednesday, aiming for 100% adherence.
Increase water intake to 8 glasses per day, starting from Thursday, aiming for a consistent habit by the end of the month.
